name: [Under development] Light up the pixel!
description:
This game is under development. Music and some graphics are missing on this version and will be upgraded soon. Weekly Game Jam - Week 127

Oops...

Seems like this pixels stopped working for some reason...

Come on, light 'em up!

Game based on the popular game "Lights out"

How to play

The game consists of a 3x3, 4x4 or 5x5 grid of broken pixels that don't work correctly.
When the game starts, some of them are switched on and some are off.
Pressing any of the pixels will toggle it and the four adjacent ones.
The goal of the puzzle is to switch all the pixels on, making it work correctly, preferably in as few button presses as possible.
